1-Main Panel Buttons
The most useful commands have been organized here.
1-1 The stuff you will use most of the time
Item: takes item id and optionally an item amount from quickbox to create such an item in your inventory. Shows specific dialog if nothing was specified.
Teleport: read coordinates from quickbox. Shows teleport and moves menu if None specified.
Spawn: takes npc_id or name (spaces must be changed to underscores); optionally spawn count and respawn time. Shows specific dialog if None.
List Spawns: takes npc_id or name (spaces need to be replaced by underscores). Show results as system messages.
Announce: takes text to announce from quickbox; shows announce menu if no text was specified.
Set: requires "parameter=value" in the quickbox. Shows settings dialog if nothing valid was specified.
GM Chat: broadcast quickbox contents for GMs only. Admin menu will popup after broadcast.
List+Go: Like Google's Lucky button, will teleport you to the first result of a List Spawn command.
Go To: reads player name from quickbox. Shows characters management screen if None specified.
Recall: brings a player to your position, if a player name was specified in the quickbox
Karma: set target's karma points to a value specified in the quickbox (if target is a player, naturally).
No Karma: works over your target just like the Karma button, but ignores QB values setting karma to zero.
